letters.description: Identify the mother's breastfeeding goals, challenges, and support system through active listening and empathetic questioning.
Provide evidence-based information and resources regarding various breastfeeding techniques, positions, and solutions to common issues.
Collaboratively develop a personalized breastfeeding plan with achievable goals and strategies tailored to the mother's individual circumstances.
Offer ongoing emotional support, practical advice, and positive reinforcement to build confidence and resilience throughout the breastfeeding journey.
Regularly assess progress, adjust the plan as needed, and empower the mother to make informed decisions about her breastfeeding experience.
